sentences.sentence: The switches close the contacts and complete the circuit.
sentences.translation: 这些开关可接通形成闭合电路。

sentences.sentence: Any attempts to cut through the cabling will break the electrical circuit.
sentences.translation: 任何切断电缆的做法都会使电路中断。

sentences.sentence: Carbon dust and oil build up in large motors and cause them to short-circuit.
sentences.translation: 碳尘和燃油在大发动机里越积越多，造成了发动机短路。
